title: #273 Disposable Thumbs
itunes:title: #273 Disposable Thumbs
description:
UPDATE: This will be the last show that Nikki will use her robot voice!

Nikki, Andrew, Chris and Noa start off by talking about the list of Best TV Shows and then somehow dive into platform shoes for men. They bring back the segment Burning Questions For Bob to ask each other what they really wanted to know about the last couple of weeks that the show has slowed down. 

-------

Watch this episode on our Youtube Channel: The Nikki Glaser Podcast

Follow the pod on Instagram for bonus content: @NikkiGlaserPod

Leave us your voicemail: Click Here To Record

Get Pod Merch: Podshop.NikkiGlaser.com

Nikki's Tour Dates: www.nikkiglaser.com/tour

Andrew's Tour Dates: www.andrewcollincomedy.com
